We recommend the body of the Notification be contained within two lines. Be descriptive and include any troubleshooting actions or next steps. When possible, communicate the main message using just the title. You can include
within the Notification body that redirect the user to next steps.

We recommend that Toast Notifications automatically disappear after five seconds. Inline Notifications are persistent until the user dismisses them. All notifications have at least one method of dismissal (typically, it is a small “x” in the upper right hand corner).
